helpSupport.title: Help & Support
helpSupport.howWouldYouLike: How would you like to contact our support team?

faqQuestions.howDoesMatchingWorkAnswer: Matching works based on your location radius and WiFi connection. You will see users who are within your set location radius or connected to the same WiFi network as you. This helps you discover people nearby for meaningful connections.
faqQuestions.howToConnect: How do I connect with other users?
faqQuestions.howToConnectAnswer: You can connect with users by going to the Nearby tab, tapping on people you want to connect with, and sending them the first message. This will send a connection request. You can also visit their profiles and tap "Connect", or find users by searching.
faqQuestions.changeProfilePicture: How do I change my profile picture?
faqQuestions.changeProfilePictureAnswer: Go to Settings > Edit Profile, then tap on your current profile picture to change it. You can take a new photo or choose from your photo library.
faqQuestions.deletePost: How do I delete a post?
faqQuestions.deletePostAnswer: Tap on one of your posts, then tap the three dots menu in the top right corner and select "Delete Post".
faqQuestions.blockOrReport: How do I block or report someone?
faqQuestions.blockOrReportAnswer: Go to their profile, tap the three dots menu, and select either "Block User". You can also report individual posts by tapping the three dots on any post.
faqQuestions.nearbyFeature: How does the Nearby feature work?
faqQuestions.nearbyFeatureAnswer: The Nearby feature shows posts and people near your current location. Make sure location permissions are enabled for the app to use this feature.
faqQuestions.changePassword: How do I change my password?
faqQuestions.changePasswordAnswer: Go to Settings > Change Password and follow the prompts to update your password.
faqQuestions.deleteAccount: How do I delete my account?
faqQuestions.deleteAccountAnswer: Go to Settings > Delete Profile. This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
faqQuestions.notReceivingNotifications: Why am I not receiving notifications?
faqQuestions.notReceivingNotificationsAnswer: Check your device settings to make sure notifications are enabled for this app. You can also check notification settings within the app.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using this application, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. We collect and use your information in accordance with our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference.
terms.conductText: You agree to use the application in a manner consistent with any and all applicable laws and regulations. You may not use the application for any unlawful purpose or any purpose prohibited under this clause.
terms.contentText: Users are responsible for the content they post. Content must not be offensive, illegal, or violate any third-party rights. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these guidelines.
terms.securityText: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.liabilityText: The application is provided "as is" without any representations or warranties. We shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this application.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.infoCollectText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, post content, send messages, or contact us for support. This includes your name, email address, profile information, posts, messages, and any other information you choose to provide.
privacy.locationText: With your permission, we collect and process information about your precise or approximate location to provide location-based features such as finding nearby users and posts. You can control location sharing through your device settings.
privacy.howWeUseText: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including to facilitate connections between users, personalize your experience, send you notifications, respond to your requests, and ensure the security of our platform.
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy. We may share information with service providers who assist us in operating our platform, conducting business, or serving users.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.retentionText: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You may delete your account at any time, which will remove your personal information from our active databases.
privacy.childrenText: Our service is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will delete that information.
privacy.rightsText: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can manage most of this information through your account settings. For additional requests, please contact us through the support channels in the app.
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting the new policy in the app and updating the "Last Updated" date below.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the Help & Support section in the app or email us at privacy@wichat.app.
